text:
Привет,

 

Моля за корекция в името на контрагента MVM CEENERGY ZRT, и крайната сума да е 44,99369 EUR/MWh, тъй като имат възражение

 

 

 

Kind regards,

Elena Kovachki  

Administration & Back office

Mob: +359 893 659 834                                                                                                                                                                                                     

www.tibiel.com/en <http://www.tibiel.com/en>                                                                        

TIBIEL EOOD



 

From: Horváth Vanda <horvathv@ceenergy.hu> 
Sent: Wednesday, November 27, 2024 10:50 AM
To: Backoffice <Backoffice@tibiel.com>; CEEnergy Back Office <backoffice@ceenergy.hu>
Cc: Aneta Ivanova <a.ivanova@tibiel.com>; Stoyan Vasilev <s.vasilev@tibiel.com>
Subject: RE: ID 171406

 

Dear Team,

thank you for the invoice, but our company name is correctly MVM CEENERGY ZRT, not MVM CEEENERGY ZRT. It contains only two „E” letters. Could you please amend this?

 

I kindly ask you to check the price as well. When I round it to 5 decimal places, this is what I get: 44,99369 EUR/MWh

 



 

Thank you for your help.

Best regards,

Vanda

 

 

Vanda Horváth

Back Office Expert

Back Office Department

 

horvathv@ceenergy.hu <mailto:horvathv@ceenergy.hu> 

Mobil: +36 20 251 0729

 

 



 

MVM CEEnergy Zrt. 

 

H-1138 Hungary,

Budapest, Váci út 144-150.

 

ceenergy.hu <http://www.ceenergy.hu/>

If you are not the intended recipient, please contact the sender by phone or by e-mail and delete this message and any attachments from your system. 

If you are not the intended recipient, note that copying or saving the message or any attachments is prohibited and its content must not be disclosed or misused in any way.

 

 

From: Backoffice <Backoffice@tibiel.com <mailto:Backoffice@tibiel.com> > 
Sent: Tuesday, November 26, 2024 2:43 PM
To: CEEnergy Back Office <backoffice@ceenergy.hu <mailto:backoffice@ceenergy.hu> >
Cc: Aneta Ivanova <a.ivanova@tibiel.com <mailto:a.ivanova@tibiel.com> >; Stoyan Vasilev <s.vasilev@tibiel.com <mailto:s.vasilev@tibiel.com> >
Subject: ID 171406

 

Dear MVM CEEnergy Zrt. Team,

 

Regarding deal on BGH with ID 171406, please find attached invoice.

 

We appreciate our partnership.

 

С най-добри пожелания,                                                   

Елена Ковачки

Администрация и Бек Офис                                             

Моб: +359 893 659 834                                                                                                                                                

www.tibiel.com <http://www.tibiel.com/>      

ТИБИЕЛ ЕООД
